product_name: Ergon Phorm S 310 Gel Max Bike Saddle - Men's
long_description: Whether touring, training for an organized ride or cruising through a park, the men's Phorm S 310 Gel Max bike saddle offers a great balance of comfort and performance. Perfect for all-around use, the resilient synthetic cover is soft to the touch and weather-resistant. Gel pads make you more comfortable by evenly distributing pressure and cushioning bumps in the road. Central channel helps take pressure off sensitive areas; splash guard under channel helps protect your undercarriage from unwelcome road spray. In comparason to standard saddles, the overall narrower width enhances freedom of movement while a wider rear section enhances weight distribution and support.
short_description: Whether touring, training for an organized ride or cruising through a park, the men's Phorm S 310 Gel Max bike saddle offers a great balance of comfort and performance.
